body_content.explanation: a situation in which one person or group of people has more importance or power than others:
examples: The company has never regained its predominance in the industry.
He questions the economic and political predominancy of the northern regions of the country.

body_content.explanation: a situation in which one type of person or thing within a set is the largest in number:
examples: There is a predominance of people with an arts degree on the board of governors.
